label: creationDateTime
comment: The creation date, time, date time, or other date time value for this payment trade settlement.

domainIncludes.comment: A document exchanged between parties for a business application level acknowledgement of the receipt of information.
A group of products considered or dealt with together.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that is exchanged between two or more parties.
A specified textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
The set of characteristics shared by all individual transactions grouped for this financing request document.
A detailed statement of work, prices, and dimensions for this valuation.
A group of crop produce considered or dealt with together.
A group of animals dealt with together.
